title: [K-12] Mixed Research-Based Instructional Design for Online Teacher Professional Development

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational educational theory knowledge or practical teaching experience
context.additional_context: Development of generalized instructional design scenarios for university students based on online professional development research for K-12 teachers

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the four core elements of online teacher professional development (learner expectations, support systems, incentives, content design)
Learners can design educational needs analysis procedures using mixed research methods (surveys + focus groups)
Learners can propose actionable instructional strategy improvements applicable to real educational settings based on research findings
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
